title: 求大神戳进来啊~小弟用MCPC+创的服务器进不去，自己都进不去！求解！怎么破？
author: 彡放不下灬
txt_content:
这是错误报告：---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// You're mean.

Time: 14-6-28 下午9:28
Description: Exception in server tick loop

cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.GameRegistryException: Failed to load the world - there are fatal block and item id issues
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLContainer.readData(FMLContainer.java:193)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:622)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

点了启动服务器那个bat文件后，到最后有一行字：this crash report has been saved to:(我服务器保存错误报告的那个路径）
出现这个后再按回车就是输入help来获得帮助，求大神解决！之后游戏里搜索服务器就打着叉，见图，求大神教怎么破！感激不尽
